text: The knowledge assessment methodology (KAM) is "an interactive benchmarking tool created by the World Bank's Knowledge for Development Program to help countries identify the challenges and opportunities they face in making the transition to the knowledge-based economy."Article, World Bank. KAM does so by providing information on knowledge economy indicators for 146 countries. Its products include the Knowledge Economy Index and the Knowledge Index. ==References== Category:Year of introduction missing Category:Knowledge economy Category:Methodology Category:Application software Category:Development economics Category:World Bank
title: Knowledge assessment methodology
